newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $68 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $68 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the Panhandle area Wednesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers steady. Feedlots reporting light inquiry.

Sales reported on 2,200 slaughter steers and 1,500 heifers; 152,700 head confirmed for week to date which includes 20,900 formulated cattle and 1,300 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week and 44 loads or 1,500 CME cattle.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 68.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs 68.00.
Wk to Date: 152,700 Week Ago: 50,000 Year Ago: 38,500
